The radio stations provide a useful message and website.
The examples in each show are to help explain the puzzle, but are not used otherwise.
The first show works differently than the rest. The other nine shows correspond with one of the clues in this puzzle.
For shows 2-10, the rule for the responses differs each time.
Examine the original grid will help reveal the rules.
If you have a two-word phrase, you should apply the mechanic of Tock's puzzle to it.
